arts.ttl: Man Utd vs Sunderland: Why isn’t Premier League match on TV?
arts.sum: Manchester United welcome Sunderland to Old Trafford in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon, but UK-based fans will miss out as the match is not on TV

arts.ttl: Man Utd vs Sunderland was left in chaos after leak covered clothes in 's***'
arts.sum: Manchester United previously faced an unfortunate situation as a burst pipe left the team in disarray and led to the kick-off being delayed

arts.ttl: 50 not out: How Amorim can match Fergie in Man United vs. Sunderland
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim can achieve a feat that no Manchester United boss since Sir Alex Ferguson has achieved in Saturday's Premier League showdown with Sunderland at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Martinez, Mazraoui – Man Utd injury news and return dates before crunch Sunderland clash
arts.sum: Manchester United are back in Premier League action this weekend as they host Sunderland at Old Trafford, and Ruben Amorim has provided an update on his squad's availability

arts.ttl: Manchester United vs Sunderland – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Manchester United will be desperate to get their season back on track on Saturday when they host high-flying Sunderland at Old Trafford. Ruben Amorim’s side are struggling in 14th place, while the newly-promoted Black Cats have made a remarkable start and sit fifth in the table. arts.ttl: Manchester United vs Sunderland – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Manchester United return to Old Trafford on Saturday, desperate for a victory to halt a stuttering start to their season. A 3-1 defeat at Brentford last weekend left the Red Devils in 14th place. This has put manager Ruben Amorim under increasing scrutiny ahead of his 50th game in charge. arts.ttl: Sunderland XI vs Manchester United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: High-flying Sunderland travel to Old Trafford on Saturday, aiming to continue their remarkable start to life back in the Premier League. The Black Cats sit fifth in the table, having collected 11 points from their opening six games—the best start by a promoted side in over a decade. arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim’s final throw of the dice at Man Utd with big changes predicted vs Sunderland
arts.athr: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Ben Husband, Felix Keith, Dan Marsh)
arts.sum: Manchester United host Sunderland at Old Trafford later today, with under-fire manager Ruben Amorim desperate for a positive result to quieten speculation over his future

arts.ttl: Score Predictions: Can Sunderland Take Points at Old Trafford?
arts.sum: Martin Wanless predicts… Score prediction: Man Utd 1 Sunderland 2 Sunderland’s first goalscorer: Le Fee If in late May you’d shown me this prediction, I’d have questioned my future sanity and requested the men in white coats visit immediately, but I honestly feel as if we have a real chance of getting all three points […]

arts.ttl: Starting XI: Is this the Sunderland team to take on Manchester United today?
arts.sum: The lads go to Old Trafford this afternoon off the back of an excellent win at Nottingham Forest last time out – and Regis Le Bris has a few selection options as he looks to seize the opportunity to add to our already impressive points tally.
